name: Pohjolan Voima Oyj
goal: Pohjolan Voima produces heat and electricity for its shareholders at cost price. Our focus is on hydropower, thermal power and nuclear power.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Taxation
euInitiatives: Energy, especially hydropower, bioenergy, CHP, nuclear energy. In addition climate and environmental politics as well as energy-related taxation.
